name: Mimes & Coins
description:
Description:

Help the mime recover his lost coins in this short platformer!

Made for Neverending Game Jam.

Controls:
  • A/D or Left/Right Keys to Move
  • W or Up Key to Jump
Credits:
  • Font: https://poppyworks.itch.io/silver
  • Music: https://madmakingmistery.itch.io/life-is-shortening
  • SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jump-1
